description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) because it uses user input to construct a file path without proper validation or sanitization, allowing an attacker to read arbitrary files on the server. It's also vulnerable to Code Injection (CWE-94) because it directly uses user input in the 'app.get' and 'app.post' methods without proper validation or sanitization, allowing an attacker to inject malicious code. Additionally, it's vulnerable to SQL Injection (CWE-89) because it uses user input in the 'Comments.getCommentData', 'Comments.replyToComment', and 'Comments.publishArticle' methods without proper validation or sanitization, allowing an attacker to manipulate SQL queries.
